cot.cot_output:
Reasoning process:
The last name Orozco is of Spanish origin. It is derived from the name of a town in the province of Biscay, in the Basque Country of Spain. The name Orozco comes from the Basque words "orro" meaning "pine tree" and "zko" meaning "place of," so Orozco means "place of pine trees."

Answer:
The last name Orozco originates from the Basque Country of Spain.
